html: Yet thou shalt be brought down to hell, to the depth of the pit. Similar language is used in 14:19 (Ps. 28:1; 38:18; 143:7), which says that Lucifer will be cast "to the stones of the pit." The pit, which is another term for hell, expresses hell's conditions; it is dark, narrow, restrictive, and extremely uncomfortable for its inhabitants. Satan sought a high position in heaven (14:13-14); in response to Satan's machinations, God, whose justice is exact and faultless, sent him to the place farthest from heaven.
